00059 #define WIN_GUI_APPLICATION
00060 
00061 
00065 bool showLauncher(int argc, char **argv){
00066 
00067   // Options initialization
00068   OptionManager::getSingleton().init();
00069   OptionManager::getSingleton().createAttributes();
00070   OptionManager::getSingleton().setAttributesDefaultValues();
00071 
00072   // The main return value
00073   bool execRet;
00074   
00075   FX::FXApp application("RainbruRPG","rainbruFreeFr");
00076   
00077   // The true should cause a segfault if omitted
00078   application.init(argc,argv, true);
00079   
00080   new Launcher(&application);
00081   
00082   application.create();
00083 
00084   // Return 999 if the game may run
00085   int ret =application.run();
00086 
00087   if (ret==999){
00088     // The game must be launched
00089     execRet=true;
00090     RainbruRPG::Core::GameEngine::getSingleton().play();
00091 
00092   }
00093   else{
00094     // The 'Quit' button was clicked : stopping execution
00095     execRet=false;
00096   }
00097 
00098   return execRet;
00099 }
00100 
00101 
00102 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00103 #  define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00104 
00105 #  define NOMINMAX
00106 #  include "windows.h"
00107 
00108 #  ifdef WIN_GUI_APPLICATION
00109 INT WINAPI WinMain( HINSTANCE hInst, HINSTANCE, LPSTR strCmdLine, INT )
00110 
00111   // We must fake the argc and argv variables
00112   // to prevent FXApp::init() call, but
00113   // the following causes a segfault
00114   int argc=1;
00115   char* fakeArgv="";
00116   char** argv=&fakeArgv;
00117 
00118 #  endif
00119 #else
00120 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00121 #endif
00122 
00123 {
00124   // Initialize the pseudo-random number generator
00125   srand((unsigned)time(0)); 
00126 
00127   // Setting up Ogre::Root
00128   GlobalURI gu;
00129   std::string plugFN=gu.getShareFile("config/plugins.cfg");
00130   std::string ogreFN=gu.getUserDirFile("ogre.cfg");
00131   new Ogre::Root(plugFN.c_str(), ogreFN.c_str(), "ogre.log");
00132 
00133   // Log out the versions
00134   Version v;
00135   v.setApplicationName("RainbruRPG Client");
00136   v.logVersion();
00137   
00138 
00139 
00140   if (showLauncher(argc, argv)){
00141 
00142     GuiManager::getSingleton().init();
00143     GameEngine::getSingleton().init();
00144     GameEngine::getSingleton().changeState(ST_MAIN_MENU);
00145 
00146     //    GuiManager::getSingleton().loadCEGUILayout("gui.xml");
00147     
00148     
00149     // main loop
00150     GameEngine::getSingleton().run();
00151     
00152     GameEngine::getSingleton().cleanup();
00153 
00154   }
00155   return 0;
00156 }
